description:
To prove their superiority over Earthlings, the frogs decide to form a soccer team, and go up against the best soccer players on Earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell to Arms, Legs, and Other Froggy Parts!
Keroro Shoutai Tettai! Saraba Pekopon yo de Arimasu
La section Keroro lève le camp !
ケロロ小隊 撤退! さらばペコポンよであります
